analysis.description:
EtherWorldCup.concludeTournament (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#608-633) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _first.send(tenth.mul(4)) (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#624)
	- _second.send(tenth.mul(3)) (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#625-626)
	- _third.send(tenth.mul(2)) (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#626-628)
	- _fourth.send(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#631)
EtherWorldCup.concludeTournament (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#608-633) allows anyone to destruct the contract
EtherWorldCup.pullRipCord (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#648-659) allows anyone to destruct the contract

EtherWorldCup.register uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(tx.origin == _customerAddress && ! playerRegistered[_customerAddress] && _isCorrectBuyin(msg.value)) (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#373-376)

EtherWorldCup.pullRipCord has external calls inside a loop:
	- _toRefund.send(191710000000000000) (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#656-657)

EtherWorldCup.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#85-87)
EtherWorldCup.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x63fed9eb6f80f491bddbc853059414c2f8eb6028.sol#87)
